Title: [BETA] The Technomancer DEVBUILD
Description:
Adds a new playable slugcat to the game: The Technomancer!
With the ability to manipulate the ancient technologies around you to your whim, what might you do with it? 

The Technomancer is a fluffy new Slugcat whose campaign takes place a long time ago, in the time of Looks to the Moon's prime. Regions are/will be much different than their future (present) versions. The world is alive, and you will get to explore it!
Authors:
Technomancer Development Team
